aiHints.identificationPrompt: Identify this spirit from the image. Extract: brand, distillery, age statement, ABV, bottle size, region, and spirit type.
aiHints.gradingRules: Assess condition: seal integrity, label condition, fill level, box condition (if applicable). Grade: Mint/Excellent/Good/Fair/Poor.
aiHints.valuationRules: Consider: rarity, age statement, distillery reputation, bottle condition, market demand. Use recent auction data for similar bottles.
